mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.title, q.body, q.memberId, q.isSecret, q.isFromUser, q.isAnswered, q.orderNo, q.regDate, q.updateDate, q.isActive, q.isFaq, m.name AS memberName, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM vet_answer va WHERE va.qna_id = q.id) AS hasAnswer FROM Qna q JOIN member m ON q.memberId = m.id WHERE q.isActive = 1 ORDER BY q.regDate DESC
